# destinations

**Interface Property**

An array of coordinates that represent end points for estimated arrival time requests.

## Declaration

```swift
destinations: Coordinate[];
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Coordinate] represents each destination in the array. You may get coordinates from [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Search/search] or [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Geocoder/lookup], which return [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Place] objects that contain coordinates. You may provide up to 10 destinations in the array.

## ETA Request

- **origin**: The starting point for estimated arrival time requests.
- **departureDate**: The time of departure used in an estimated arrival time request.
- **transportType**: The mode of transportation the server uses when estimating arrival times.
